diff --git a/api/serverless.js b/api/serverless.js
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..c30a767
--- /dev/null
+++ b/api/serverless.js
@@ -0,0 +1,226 @@
+// Vercel ÏÑúÎ≤ÑÎ¶¨Ïä§ Ìï®ÏàòÏö© CHARM_INYEON API
+const express = require('express');
+const cors = require('cors');
+const path = require('path');
+
+const app = express();
+
+// CORS ÏÑ§Ï†ï - Î™®Îì† Ïò§Î¶¨ÏßÑ ÌóàÏö© (Í∞úÎ∞úÏö©)
+app.use(cors({
+  origin: '*',
+  methods: ['GET', 'POST', 'PUT', 'DELETE', 'OPTIONS'],
+  allowedHeaders: ['Content-Type', 'Authorization']
+}));
+
+app.use(express.json({ limit: '10mb' }));
+app.use(express.urlencoded({ extended: true, limit: '10mb' }));
+
+// Ï†ïÏ†Å ÌååÏùº ÏÑúÎπô
+app.use(express.static(path.join(__dirname, '..')));
+
+// ÌÖåÏä§Ìä∏ ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ïûê Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞ (In-Memory, Î∞∞Ìè¨ ÌÖåÏä§Ìä∏Ïö©)
+const testUsers = [
+  {
+    id: '686bc424bdc898fe84317d51',
+    name: 'ÍπÄÏÑ∏Î†å',
+    age: '51-55',
+    gender: 'male',
+    location: { city: 'ÏÑúÏö∏', district: 'Í∞ïÎÇ®Íµ¨' },
+    bio: 'Ïö¥Î™ÖÏ†ÅÏù∏ ÎßåÎÇ®ÏùÑ Í∏∞Îã§Î¶¨Îäî ÏÇ¨ÎûåÏûÖÎãàÎã§. ÏÑ∏Î†åÎîîÌîºÌã∞Î•º ÎØøÏúºÎ©∞ ÏßÑÏ†ïÌïú Ïù∏Ïó∞ÏùÑ Ï∞æÍ≥† ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§.',
+    interests: ['Î¨∏ÌôîÏÉùÌôú', 'ÎèÖÏÑú', 'Ïó¨Ìñâ', 'ÏùåÏïÖÍ∞êÏÉÅ'],
+    hasAssessment: true,
+    isActive: true,
+    profileCompleteness: 85,
+    createdAt: '2025-07-29T04:02:21.410Z'
+  },
+  {
+    id: '686bc47cdbe9a3ad7e138f970',
+    name: 'Ïù¥Îß§Î†•',
+    age: '46-50',
+    gender: 'female', 
+    location: { city: 'ÏÑúÏö∏', district: 'ÏÑúÏ¥àÍµ¨' },
+    bio: 'ÏßÑÏ†ïÌïú Ïù∏Ïó∞ÏùÑ Ï∞æÍ≥† ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. Ìï®Íªò ÏõÉÍ≥† Ïö∏ Ïàò ÏûàÎäî Îî∞ÎúªÌïú ÏÇ¨ÎûåÏùÑ ÎßåÎÇòÍ≥† Ïã∂Ïñ¥Ïöî.',
+    interests: ['ÏöîÎ¶¨', 'ÏòÅÌôîÍ∞êÏÉÅ', 'ÏÇ∞Ï±Ö', 'Ïπ¥ÌéòÌà¨Ïñ¥'],
+    hasAssessment: true,
+    isActive: true,
+    profileCompleteness: 92,
+    createdAt: '2025-07-29T04:02:27.234Z'
+  }
+];
+
+// API ÎùºÏö∞Ìä∏Îì§
+app.get('/api/users', (req, res) => {
+  res.json({
+    success: true,
+    data: {
+      users: testUsers,
+      totalCount: testUsers.length,
+      currentCount: testUsers.length
+    },
+    message: 'Ï¥ù 2Î™ÖÏùò ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÎ•º Ï°∞ÌöåÌñàÏäµÎãàÎã§.'
+  });
+});
+
+app.get('/api/matching/test', (req, res) => {
+  const user1 = testUsers[0]; // ÍπÄÏÑ∏Î†å
+  const user2 = testUsers[1]; // Ïù¥Îß§Î†•
+  
+  const compatibility = {
+    totalScore: 70,
+    breakdown: {
+      valuesAlignment: 100,      // Í∞ÄÏπòÍ¥Ä ÏùºÏπòÎèÑ 100%
+      lifestyleMatch: 50,        // ÎùºÏù¥ÌîÑÏä§ÌÉÄÏùº 50%
+      maritalStatusCompatibility: 50,
+      childrenCompatibility: 50,
+      occupationCompatibility: 50,
+      ageCompatibility: 90,      // Ïó∞Î†π Ìò∏ÌôòÏÑ± 90%
+      locationCompatibility: 30   // ÏßÄÏó≠ Ìò∏ÌôòÏÑ± 30%
+    }
+  };
+
+  res.json({
+    success: true,
+    data: {
+      testInfo: {
+        timestamp: new Date().toISOString(),
+        testUsers: {
+          user1: { name: user1.name, age: user1.age },
+          user2: { name: user2.name, age: user2.age }
+        }
+      },
+      results: {
+        advancedCompatibility: compatibility,
+        potentialMatches: [
+          {
+            userId: user2.id,
+            name: user2.name,
+            age: user2.age,
+            compatibilityScore: 70,
+            serendipityScore: 64,
+            matchReason: 'Í∞ÄÏπòÍ¥Ä ÏùºÏπòÎèÑÍ∞Ä ÎÜíÍ≥† ÏÉùÌôú Ìå®ÌÑ¥Ïù¥ Ï°∞ÌôîÎ°≠ÏäµÎãàÎã§.'
+          }
+        ],
+        database: {
+          totalUsers: testUsers.length,
+          totalAssessments: testUsers.length,
+          users: testUsers.map(u => ({ 
+            name: u.name, 
+            age: u.age, 
+            hasAssessment: u.hasAssessment 
+          }))
+        }
+      }
+    },
+    message: 'Îß§Ïπ≠ ÏãúÏä§ÌÖú ÌÖåÏä§Ìä∏Í∞Ä ÏôÑÎ£åÎêòÏóàÏäµÎãàÎã§.'
+  });
+});
+
+// Health check
+app.get('/api/health', (req, res) => {
+  res.json({
+    status: 'OK',
+    timestamp: new Date().toISOString(),
+    version: '2.0.0-serverless',
+    environment: 'production',
+    database: 'in-memory',
+    users: testUsers.length
+  });
+});
+
+// Ping ÏóîÎìúÌè¨Ïù∏Ìä∏
+app.get('/ping', (req, res) => {
+  res.json({ 
+    message: 'pong',
+    timestamp: new Date().toISOString(),
+    server: 'CHARM_INYEON Serverless'
+  });
+});
+
+// Î©îÏù∏ ÌéòÏù¥ÏßÄ
+app.get('/', (req, res) => {
+  res.sendFile(path.join(__dirname, '..', 'index.html'));
+});
+
+// Ï†ïÏ†Å ÌååÏùº ÎùºÏö∞Ìä∏Îì§
+app.get('/script.js', (req, res) => {
+  res.setHeader('Content-Type', 'application/javascript');
+  res.sendFile(path.join(__dirname, '..', 'script.js'));
+});
+
+app.get('/api-client.js', (req, res) => {
+  res.setHeader('Content-Type', 'application/javascript');
+  res.sendFile(path.join(__dirname, '..', 'api-client.js'));
+});
+
+app.get('/signup.js', (req, res) => {
+  res.setHeader('Content-Type', 'application/javascript');
+  res.sendFile(path.join(__dirname, '..', 'signup.js'));
+});
+
+app.get('/values-assessment.js', (req, res) => {
+  res.setHeader('Content-Type', 'application/javascript');
+  res.sendFile(path.join(__dirname, '..', 'values-assessment.js'));
+});
+
+// HTML ÌååÏùºÎì§
+app.get('/signup.html', (req, res) => {
+  res.setHeader('Content-Type', 'text/html');
+  res.sendFile(path.join(__dirname, '..', 'signup.html'));
+});
+
+app.get('/values-assessment.html', (req, res) => {
+  res.setHeader('Content-Type', 'text/html');
+  res.sendFile(path.join(__dirname, '..', 'values-assessment.html'));
+});
+
+// CSS ÌååÏùºÎì§
+app.get('/styles.css', (req, res) => {
+  res.setHeader('Content-Type', 'text/css');
+  res.sendFile(path.join(__dirname, '..', 'styles.css'));
+});
+
+app.get('/styles/:file', (req, res) => {
+  res.setHeader('Content-Type', 'text/css');
+  res.sendFile(path.join(__dirname, '..', 'styles', req.params.file));
+});
+
+app.get('/styles/base/:file', (req, res) => {
+  res.setHeader('Content-Type', 'text/css');
+  res.sendFile(path.join(__dirname, '..', 'styles', 'base', req.params.file));
+});
+
+app.get('/styles/components/:file', (req, res) => {
+  res.setHeader('Content-Type', 'text/css');
+  res.sendFile(path.join(__dirname, '..', 'styles', 'components', req.params.file));
+});
+
+// Î™®Îì† ÎÇòÎ®∏ÏßÄ ÏöîÏ≤≠ Ï≤òÎ¶¨
+app.get('*', (req, res) => {
+  // API ÏöîÏ≤≠Ïù¥ ÏïÑÎãå Í≤ΩÏö∞ index.html Î∞òÌôò
+  if (!req.path.startsWith('/api')) {
+    res.sendFile(path.join(__dirname, '..', 'index.html'));
+  } else {
+    res.status(404).json({
+      error: 'API endpoint not found',
+      message: `Cannot ${req.method} ${req.originalUrl}`,
+      availableEndpoints: [
+        'GET /api/users',
+        'GET /api/matching/test',
+        'GET /api/health',
+        'GET /ping'
+      ]
+    });
+  }
+});
+
+// ÏóêÎü¨ Ìï∏Îì§Îü¨
+app.use((err, req, res, next) => {
+  console.error('Server error:', err);
+  res.status(500).json({
+    error: 'Internal Server Error',
+    message: err.message,
+    timestamp: new Date().toISOString()
+  });
+});
+
+module.exports = app;
